gettingStarted.title: How tall are you?
gettingStarted.subtitle: The taller you are, the more calories your body needs.

gettingStarted.title: What’s your weight?
gettingStarted.subtitle: The more you weigh, the more calories your body burns

gettingStarted.title: How active are you?
gettingStarted.subtitle: A sedentary person burns fewer calories than an active person.

gettingStarted.title: What’s your age?
gettingStarted.subtitle: Required number of calories varies with age.
